DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study use novel technology measure rate turnover new fat cell . Analysis volunteer sample ongoing , however study currently enrol new volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Aged 1849 year . Healthy . Significant chronic medical illness . Illicit substance alcohol abuse . Body mass index > 27 kg/meters square . Underweight ( BMI < 20 kg/m2 ) . History keloid formation ( excessive scarring ) . Pregnant .
